description: The go-anywhere, ultra-comfy fleece that's an essential part of your weekend migration kit whether you're headed for the desert, the woods or the mountains, the HiCamp™ Fleece Pullover features soft, lightweight, high-loft Sherpa fleece and a unique pullover design—the perfect companion for any trip out of cell service.
name: Mountain Hardwear HiCamp Fleece Pullover - Mens
